name: Beetiles
description:
This game was made for the Curdle Jam #5.  

Manguels friends have all gone missing!  Embark on a journey to rescue all of your pals and return home victorious for some excellent snacking.

Made by:

Alek Tepylo = https://alek-t.itch.io/

Kyle Ennis = https://revolver1399.itch.io/
